text:
Marie Watters Colton (October 20, 1922 – September 25, 2018) was an American politician. She was born in Asheville, North Carolina. She represented the 51st district in the North Carolina House of Representatives from 1978 to 1994 as a Democrat.
Colton died at a retirement center in Asheville from congestive heart failure on September 25, 2018, aged 95.
